meanings.definition: A formal dance for high school or college students.
meanings.sent1: The debs at the school dance looked elegant in their gowns.
meanings.sent2: I remember my first debs in high school; it was so much fun!
meanings.sent3: The debs twirled gracefully on the dance floor, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The debs glided across the room like graceful swans.
meanings.sent5: Attending the debs is a memorable experience for every student.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the name Deborah.
meanings.sent1: Debs is a common nickname for girls named Deborah.
meanings.sent2: I have a friend named Debs; her full name is Deborah.
meanings.sent3: When Debs introduced herself, everyone smiled at her friendly demeanor.
meanings.sent4: Debs' kindness shines through in every interaction.
meanings.sent5: I always enjoy chatting with Debs; she has a warm personality.

meanings.definition: The plural of the word 'deb', meaning a debutante.
meanings.sent1: The debs at the ball were the center of attention.
meanings.sent2: The debs made their grand entrance at the debutante ball.
meanings.sent3: The debs giggled nervously as they prepared for their presentation.
meanings.sent4: The debs sparkled like diamonds under the ballroom lights.
meanings.sent5: The debs' elegance and poise left a lasting impression on the guests.
